==German== ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|gmh|stat}}, from {{der|de|goh|stat}}, from {{der|de|gem-pro|*stadiz}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*stéh₂tis}}. Related to {{cog|en|stead}}, {{cog|got|𐍃𐍄𐌰𐌸𐍃||place}}, {{cog|da|-}} and {{cog|sv|stad}}, {{cog|nl|stad}}, {{cog|yi|שטאָט|tr=shtot|sc=Hebr}}. Originally the same word as {{m|de|Statt}} and {{m|de|Stätte}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ʃtat/}} * {{audio|de|De-Stadt.OGG}} {{IPA|de|/diː‿ʃtat/}} * {{homophones|de|statt}} * {{rhymes|de|at}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Städte|Städtchen|dim2=Städtlein}} # [[city]] {{gloss|large settlement}} #* '''1931''', [[w:de:Gebhard Mehring|Gebhard Mehring]], ''[[s:de:Schrift und Schrifttum|Schrift und Schrifttum]]'', Silberburg-Verlag, page 13: #*: Der Zerfall des Römerreiches raubte der '''Stadt''' Rom die alte Stellung als Mittelpunkt alles Geschehens. #*:: The decay of the Roman empire robbed the '''city''' of Rome of the old position as the center of all that was happening. # [[town]] {{gloss|settlement larger than a village}} # {{lb|de|metonymy}} [[city center]] {{gloss|central business area of a city}} # {{lb|de|metonymy}} city, town, [[town council]], [[city council]] {{gloss|governing body of people elected to oversee management of a municipality}} ====Usage notes==== * For some speakers, the plural has an irregular lengthening of the stem vowel. See {{m|de|Städte}}. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|pl=Städte}} ====Related terms==== {{rel4|de| |{{l|de|Großstadt|g=f}} |{{l|de|Hansestadt|g=f}} |{{l|de|Hauptstadt|g=f}} |{{l|de|Darmstadt|g=n}} |{{l|de|Schlafstadt|g=f}} |stadtauswärts |stadtbekannt |Stadtbewohner |{{l|de|Stadtbummel|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtgebiet|g=n}} |{{l|de|Stadtkreis|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtleben|g=n}} |{{l|de|Stadtluft|g=f}} |{{l|de|Stadtmensch|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtmitte|g=f}} |{{l|de|Stadtpark|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtplanung|g=f}} |{{l|de|Stadtrand|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtrat|g=m}} |{{l|de|Stadtschule|g=f}} |{{l|de|Stadtwappen|g=n}} |{{l|de|Stadtzentrum|g=n}} |{{l|de|Trabantenstadt|g=f}} }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Städter}} * {{l|de|städtisch}} * {{l|de|Statt}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|hrx|xtat}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
